name: bibox
description: AI Enhanced Encrypted Digital Asset Exchange. The founding team is formed by top tier Chinese Blockchain and Crypto giants such as Okcoin and Houbi core team.

name: binance
description: Lowest trading fees. Has its own currency: BNB.

name: bitsquare
description: TOR-based decentralized exchange with escrow service. Bitsquare is an open-source desktop application with a TOR interface. Some setup may be required to gain access to TOR.

name: bitz
description: Bit-Z is a Hong Kong exchange. It provides professional digital asset trading services. In addition, Bit-Z allows over-the-counter trades, which utilize a private wallet directly, obviating some transfer fees.

name: changelly
description: Decentralized Exchange -- Only miner fees, no exchange fees. Changelly's trading algorithms are integrated into trading platforms such as Binance, Bittrex, Poloniex, and HitBTC. Whenever a user exchanges one cryptocurrency to another, the corresponding rate is picked up and suggested to them in real time, much like Shapeshift. In the span of milliseconds, Changelly correlates the amount to exchange and places bid/ask orders on the trading platforms and picks the best rate possible. Changelly was developed as an independent exchange service with a separate team and CEO, Konstantin Gladych.

name: cryptopia
description: New Zealand Exchange. Focuses on user experience.

name: kraken
description: US-based cryptocurrency exchange operating in Canada, the EU, Japan, and the US. Kraken provides Bitcoin pricing to the Bloomberg Terminal. Fiat funding options.

name: liqui
description: Headquartered in Kiev, Ukraine, with employees in Russia, Armenia, and USA. The total project is run by 7 individuals.

name: kucoin
description: Hong Kong-based exchange rumored to have higher than average exit fees. Restart of Kubi, which was previously shut down.

name: shapeshift
description: Decentralized Exchange -- Only miner fees; no exhcange fees. Founded in Switzerland by Roger Ver and Barry Silbert. Funded by Bitfinex, Bitcoin Capital, and Mardal Investments. Recent investments by European venture capital firm Earlybird.
